alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:14AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Phelps, western Kearney, southwestern Buffalo and southeastern Dawson Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 414 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Overton, or 13 miles southeast of Lexington, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elm Creek around 425 AM CDT. Odessa around 430 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Funk and Axtell. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 245 and 272. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
